sign_in_to_account: Sign in to your CargoConnect account
delete_transporter_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transporter? This will also delete their user account.
payment_success: Payment Successful! Your request has been approved.
verification_error: An error occurred while verifying payment. Please check your internet connection or contact support.
type_address_click_map: Type address or click on map...
no_road_route: Could not find a road route between these locations.
error_calculating_route: Error calculating route. Please try again.
fill_all_fields: Please fill all fields and select locations on map.
delete_request_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this request? This action cannot be undone.
password_blank_msg: Leave blank to keep current password
profile_update_error: An error occurred while updating profile.
new_requests_appear_here: New delivery requests will appear here
all_intransit_appear_here: All in-transit deliveries will appear here
transporter_profile_note: Note: Plate Number and Vehicle Type will be assigned by the admin when you receive delivery assignments.
hero_title: Smart Logistics for a Moving World
hero_subtitle: Connect with trusted transporters, track your cargo in real-time with GPS, and manage your supply chain effortlessly.
features_subtitle: Everything you need to manage your shipments in one place.
gps_tracking_desc: Watch your cargo move on the map in real-time. Know exactly where your shipment is at any moment.
secure_payments_desc: Integrated with Chapa for secure, seamless payments. Pay only when you're ready.
verified_transporters_desc: Access a network of verified, reliable transporters ready to move your goods safely.
about_desc: CargoConnect is a modern logistics platform built to simplify cargo transportation, connect customers with trusted transporters, and bring transparency to logistics operations.
mission_desc: To make logistics smarter, faster, and more reliable for businesses and individuals.
efficiency_desc: We eliminate delays and complexity by digitizing the entire shipping lifecycle — from request to delivery.
trust_desc: We work only with verified transporters, ensuring safety, accountability, and peace of mind.
innovation_desc: By leveraging GPS tracking and smart systems, we push logistics into the future.
vision_desc: We envision a future where moving goods is as simple as sending a message — transparent, trackable, and accessible to everyone.
Contact_us_desc: We're here to help with your logistics needs.
how_it_works_subtitle: A simple and efficient way to manage your logistics.
step_1_customer_desc: Enter your pickup and delivery locations, cargo details, and get an instant quote.
step_2_customer_desc: Pay securely using Chapa. Your payment is held safely until the delivery is completed.
step_3_customer_desc: Track your cargo on the map in real-time and receive notifications on status changes.
step_4_customer_desc: Your cargo is delivered to the destination, and you can rate your transporter.
step_1_transporter_desc: Browse available delivery requests in your area and choose the ones that fit your schedule.
step_2_transporter_desc: Accept a request, navigate to the pickup location, and start the delivery.
step_3_transporter_desc: Keep the customer informed by updating the delivery status through the app.
step_4_transporter_desc: Once the delivery is confirmed, your earnings are added to your wallet immediately.
footer_brand_desc: Connecting businesses with reliable transporters across Ethiopia. Fast, secure, and transparent logistics for everyone.
services_desc: Comprehensive logistics solutions tailored for your needs.
freight_transport_desc: Reliable transportation for all types of cargo across the country.
real_time_tracking_desc: Monitor your shipment's progress with our advanced GPS tracking system.
secure_logistics_desc: Your cargo is handled with care and protected by our secure systems.
for_transporters_desc: Join Ethiopia's fastest-growing logistics network and maximize your earnings.
grow_your_business_desc: Access a wide range of shipping requests and expand your client base.
easy_management_desc: Manage your fleet and assignments efficiently through our dashboard.
for_businesses_desc: Optimize your supply chain with our enterprise-grade logistics platform.
streamline_logistics_desc: Reduce complexity and improve efficiency in your shipping operations.
cost_effective_desc: Get competitive pricing and reduce your overall logistics costs.
pricing_desc: Simple and transparent pricing for all our services.
transparent_pricing_desc: No hidden fees. You only pay for what you use.
legal_desc: Legal information and policies for using CargoConnect.
privacy_policy_content: We value your privacy. This policy explains how we collect and use your data.
terms_of_service_content: By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions.
pp_intro_text: At CargoConnect, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our logistics platform.
pp_info_collect_text: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services:
pp_collect_personal: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and physical address.
pp_collect_shipment: Shipment Details: Pickup/dropoff locations, cargo descriptions, weight, and dimensions.
pp_collect_location: Location Data: Real-time GPS coordinates of shipments for tracking purposes.
pp_collect_payment: Payment Information: Transaction details processed securely via Chapa.
pp_usage_text: Your information is used for the following purposes:
pp_usage_service: To facilitate cargo requests and connect customers with transporters.
pp_usage_tracking: To provide real-time tracking updates to both parties.
pp_usage_comm: To send notifications regarding shipment status and account updates.
pp_sharing_text: We share relevant shipment details between customers and assigned transporters. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
pp_security_text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.
tos_acceptance_text: By accessing or using CargoConnect, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws in Ethiopia.
tos_service_text: CargoConnect provides a digital platform connecting individuals and businesses with transportation service providers for cargo delivery.
tos_user_resp_text: As a user of our platform, you agree to:
tos_resp_accuracy: Provide accurate and complete information for all requests and profiles.
tos_resp_prohibited: Not use the service to transport illegal, hazardous, or prohibited items.
tos_resp_security: Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials.
tos_payment_text: Payments are processed through Chapa. All fees are transparently displayed before you confirm a request. Refund policies are subject to specific service agreements.
tos_liability_text: CargoConnect is a platform and is not liable for direct or indirect damages arising from the transportation services provided by third-party transporters.
tos_governing_law_text: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia.
services_subtitle: Comprehensive logistics solutions for every need.
for_customers_desc: Ship anything, anywhere, with full transparency and ease.
customer_service_1: Instant Quotes: Get transparent pricing based on distance and weight.
customer_service_2: Real-time Tracking: Monitor your cargo's journey on a live map.
customer_service_3: Secure Payments: Pay safely through integrated Chapa gateway.
transporter_service_1: Steady Stream of Jobs: Access a wide range of delivery requests daily.
transporter_service_2: Fleet Management: Easily manage your vehicles and assignments.
transporter_service_3: Fast Payouts: Receive your earnings quickly after successful deliveries.
business_service_1: Bulk Shipping: Manage large-scale cargo movements effortlessly.
business_service_2: Detailed Analytics: Track your logistics spending and efficiency.
business_service_3: Priority Support: Dedicated account management for business partners.
pricing_subtitle: Fair and predictable costs for all your shipping needs.
pricing_base_rate: Base Rate: Starting from 500 ETB for local deliveries.
pricing_distance_rate: Distance: Calculated per kilometer based on the most efficient route.
pricing_weight_rate: Weight: Flexible pricing tiers for different cargo sizes.
pricing_commission: Commission: Transparent 20% platform fee for transporters.
anywhere_delivery_desc: From urban centers to remote areas, we deliver your cargo wherever it needs to go.
grow_with_us_desc: Scale your business with our advanced tools and wide customer reach.
logistics_optimization_desc: Advanced routing and fleet management to reduce your operational costs.
enter_email_reset: Enter your email to receive a reset link.
enter_code_email: Enter the code sent to your email.
request_not_found: Request not found or not paid
failed_load_transporters_vehicles: Failed to load transporters or vehicles
